Package Model.Players

Class HumanPlayer

java.lang.Object
Model.Players.Player
Model.Players.HumanPlayer
public class HumanPlayer extends Player
This class specializes Player to profile a human player
Author:
D'annibale Luigi, Venturini Daniele
